devicePage.name: _instance

binaryOption.name: tsi_gencs_stpe
binaryOption.toolTip: Controls operation while in Low Power Modes (STOP, VLPS, LLS and VLLS{3,2,1})

binaryOption.name: tsi_gencs_stm
binaryOption.toolTip: Selects between software and hardware triggers

binaryOption.name: tsi_gencs_esor
binaryOption.toolTip: Selects between End-of-Scan or Out-of-Range Interrupt

binaryOption.name: tsi_gencs_erie
binaryOption.toolTip: Caused either by a Short or Overrun Error

binaryOption.name: tsi_gencs_tsiie
binaryOption.description: Touch Sensing Input Interrupt Module Enable

intOption.name: tsi_gencs_nscn
intOption.toolTip: Number of Consecutive Scans Per Electrode

devicePage.template: \tstatic constexpr uint32_t tsi_gencs = \ \t TSI_GENCS_STPE($(tsi_gencs_stpe)) | // TSI STOP Enable \t TSI_GENCS_STM($(tsi_gencs_stm)) | // Scan Trigger Mode \t TSI_GENCS_ESOR($(tsi_gencs_esor)) | // EOS or OOR Interrupt select \t TSI_GENCS_ERIE($(tsi_gencs_erie)) | // Error Interrupt Enable \t TSI_GENCS_TSIIE($(tsi_gencs_tsiie)) | // Touch Sensing Input Interrupt Module Enable \t TSI_GENCS_PS($(tsi_gencs_ps)) | // Electrode Oscillator Prescaler \t TSI_GENCS_NSCN($(tsi_gencs_nscn)-1) | // Consecutive Scan number \t TSI_GENCS_LPSCNITV($(tsi_gencs_lpscnitv)) | // Low-Power Mode Scan Interval \t TSI_GENCS_LPCLKS($(tsi_gencs_lpclks)); // Low-Power Mode Clock Source\n\n

\tstatic constexpr uint32_t tsi_scanc = \ \t TSI_SCANC_AMPSC($(tsi_scanc_ampsc)) | // Active Mode Prescaler \t TSI_SCANC_AMCLKS($(tsi_scanc_amclks)) | // Active Mode Clock Source \t TSI_SCANC_SMOD($(tsi_scanc_smod)) | // Scan Period Modulus \t TSI_SCANC_EXTCHRG(($(tsi_scanc_extchrg)/2)-1) | // External Oscillator Charge Current select \t TSI_SCANC_REFCHRG(($(tsi_scanc_refchrg)/2)-1); // Reference Oscillator Charge Current select\n\n

intOption.name: tsi_pen_lpsp
intOption.toolTip: Selects a channel to be active in low power mode

devicePage.template: \tstatic constexpr uint32_t tsi_pen = \ \t ($(tsi_pen_pen)) | // Pins enable channel as TSI inputs \t TSI_PEN_LPSP($(tsi_pen_lpsp)); // Low Power Scan channel\n\n

intOption.name: tsi_threshold_lthh
intOption.description: Low Power Channel Low Threshold value
intOption.toolTip: Determines the low threshold for the channel active in low power mode

intOption.name: tsi_threshold_hthh
intOption.description: Low Power Channel High Threshold value
intOption.toolTip: Determines the high threshold for the channel active in low power mode

devicePage.template: \tstatic constexpr uint32_t tsi_threshold = \ \t TSI_THRESHOLD_LTHH($(tsi_threshold_lthh)) | // Low Power Channel Low Threshold value \t TSI_THRESHOLD_HTHH($(tsi_threshold_hthh)); // Low Power Channel High Threshold value\n\n
